data.name: Encased RPG - Portrait Pack
data.detailed_description:
Change the look of your C.R.O.N.U.S. employee with a set of 10 additional portraits. You can use these portraits to create a character at the start of the game. This set will help you explore the world under the Dome with a character that suits you better.

The bundle includes:


  • 10 new in-game portraits for the main character
data.about_the_game:
Change the look of your C.R.O.N.U.S. employee with a set of 10 additional portraits. You can use these portraits to create a character at the start of the game. This set will help you explore the world under the Dome with a character that suits you better.

The bundle includes:


  • 10 new in-game portraits for the main character
data.short_description: Change the look of your C.R.O.N.U.S. employee with a set of 10 additional portraits. You can use these portraits to create a character at the start of the game. This set will help you explore the world under the Dome with a character that suits you better.
data.supported_languages:
English*, Russian
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 64-bit (7SP1/8/8.1/10)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 или аналогичный
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 660m
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX совместимая звуковая карта
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 64-bit (8/8.1/10)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX совместимая звуковая карта
